title: Strengthening Science Competencies Through Constructivist Learning Design and Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment integrating online and offline modalities using digital devices.

learning_goals: Improvement of project design and implementation capabilities based on constructivist learning theory
Developing Self-Directed Learning Strategies Using Learning Analytics Tools

Learners participate in team activities at least once a week for six months in scientific problem-solving processes (e.g., SWOT analysis, 5Why analysis) and submit a self-regulated learning checklist (5 items, including goal setting, time management, feedback incorporation, etc.) with at least 80% achievement.
Proposing Data-Driven Feedback Strategies to Improve Learning Outcomes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
